name: Barbell Bench Press
description: A bench press is an upper body exercise that involves lying on a bench and pressing weight upward using a barbell or dumbbells. The primary movers of the bench press are the pectoralis major, anterior deltoids, and the triceps
tips: Lift with confidence always! If you fail the rep, then you failed the rep. No big deal. Just keep it pushing and you'll get it at some point.
Don't be hesitant to ask for a spot if you don't have a gym partner. Most people are happy to help. There's research showing that a lifter will perform better with a spotter.

instructions.instruction: Lay flat on the bench with your feet on the ground. With straight arms unrack the bar.
Lower the bar to your mid chest

instruction: Raise the bar until you've locked your elbows.
